LanguageData.CommandFireGlobalDesc: Select a target on the world map and perform a ranged attack.
LanguageData.CommandFireLocalDesc: Manually command the turret to attack targets on the local map.
LanguageData.MessageTargetMustBeMap: The target of a ranged attack must be a location that has already been explored.
LanguageData.CommandClearAllTargetsDesc: Clears all currently set local and remote goals.
